CustomField.description: This field associates the group (which comprises an online application) with a particular Online Application Context Type. This value defaults to Applicant, which is the appropriate Context Type for a primary applicant. If the group is for primary applicants, enter Applicant. If the group is for business co-owners added to a deposit application, enter Owner. If the group is for co-borrowers or guarantors added to a small business loan application, enter Other Involved (Individual).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a defined Context Type which this Group will be associated to. For primary applicants, enter Applicant. For co-owners added to a deposit, enter Owner. For co-borrowers or guarantors added to a small business loan, enter Other Involved (Individual).
CustomField.label: Context Type
